pages.text: $(li)The Rain Forest is a biome composed of trees flooded by the abundant water.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this wet place you can find some vegetation, like Rosewood and Morado Trees, Lily Pads, Bird of Paradise and Scalding Monkey Brush.

$(li)Some animals such as $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can find an exclusive kind of $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spider$(/l) in this biome known as the $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/plantain_spider)Plantain Spider$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Rainforest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
